adrFormatAddress: 7 E 47th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Rafka made my engagement ring and diamond wedding band over 30 years ago.  The owner - Ralph -has also made other jewelry for me. He’s been in the jewelry business a very long time and is an expert jeweler. He knows the latest trends, as well as the classics. He advised us how to select the best value diamonds, and then gave us an excellent price. He’s also very honest and personable, so he’s made our  our experience at Rafka consistently enjoyable and stress-free over many years.

originalText.text: Ralph made the most beautiful engagement ring for me! My husband also surprised me with diamond earrings and an eternity wedding band designed by Ralph! Ralph took his time to ensure everything was flawless, and created an amazing experience with the most timeless, classic and most beautiful engagement ring, diamond earrings and eternity wedding band, I never thought I would ever own the most beautiful jewelry! He is truly one of a kind and a natural artist! Beyond 5 stars!!!

originalText.text: Rafka personally designed an engagement for me after taking the time to go over all options. Not knowing much about the process of picking out a ring, he was able to thoroughly explain things to me which allowed me to pick the best ring possible within my price range. My highest recommendation for those looking for a hand made, one of a kind engagement ring with perfect service.

originalText.text: Impeccable craftsmanship and unique one-of-a-kind design shine through with all of Rafka's pieces. His creativity is top-notch and I highly recommend shopping here for jewelry that creates an experience every time you wear it.
